content.text:
Generate a list of high-level dimension of quality that apply to the following context based on a given set of input-output pairs and a chatbot context.

Steps
Understand Context: Review the provided chatbot context to understand the operational environment and its primary goals.
Analyze Input-Output Pairs: Examine each input-output pair to identify recurring themes, patterns, and any variations that highlight different aspects of quality.
Extract Broad Dimensions: Derive high-level criteria that are broadly applicable across multiple input-output pairs, focusing on overall quality attributes.
Summarize: Condense output into a concise list that can guide quality assessment in similar chatbot interactions.
Output Format should be in the following json format
{"criteria":[
  {
    "criteria_name": "<CRITERIA NAME>",
    "criteria_definition": "<CRITERIA DEFINITION>"
  }
]
}
